thread.title: Ground News - Yemen... Major Arab and UN efforts pave the way for peace
thread.title_full: Ground News - Yemen... Major Arab and UN efforts pave the way for peace

author: aletihad.ae
title: Ground News - Yemen... Major Arab and UN efforts pave the way for peace
text:
Summary by aletihad.ae Ahmed Shaban (Aden, Cairo) The year 2023 witnessed great efforts to achieve peace in Yemen, including the moves led by Saudi Arabia, Oman and the United Nations to seek a sustainable and acceptable political solution by all Yemeni parties, and a lasting and comprehensive ceasefire to the conflict and the 9-year war between the Houthi group and the legitimate government. A new agreement. After years of talks and negotiations, the United Nations a… Share menu More
